channel.title: Custom Animation Frames
channel.description:
Thought i'd show you this. It's not the usual custom animation made by mixing existing frames, it's a custom animation frame, made by directly editing the animation files, file 74 to be specific.
Was going to make the character kick itself in the head by making an entire set of new frames, but as you can see in the picture, it's not possible with a standard model. Reason is, the triangle priorities for the legs are lower than the priorites for the chest and head, result is what you see in the picture on the right.
[IMG]http://i219.photobucket.com/albums/cc76/MrPotatoHead2/animframe1.jpg[/img]
Damn, that would have been so funny. :(

Nice, never played it.
You got the format spec or you want me to post it over on mitb?
